title: Pressure cooker lamb tagine
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1.5kg lamb shoulder, cut into pieces', '3 garlic cloves, minced', '2 onions, minced', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 pinch saffron', 'salt and pepper to taste', '500g prunes, stones removed and soaked in water', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '100g flaked almonds', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds']
